fullplot: A boy preacher named Isaac goes to a town in Nebraska called Gatlin and gets all the children to murder every adult in town. A young couple have a murder to report and they go to the nearest town (Gatlin) to seek help but the town seems deserted. They are soon trapped in Gatlin with little chance of getting out alive.
plot: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.
title: Children of the Corn
